title.narrative: Nutrition and Malaria Control for Child Survival

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve utilization of selected community-based health and nutrition services for children under the age of two and pregnant women in the selected districts.

condition.narrative: MOH to adopt a sub-project manual defining the eligibility criteria, approval, disbursement, administration and monitoring andevalu ation arrangements
MOH to finalize an annual POW detailing the project activities and eligible expenditure planned for the following FY and submit toI DA by Oct 31 of each year
MOH to finalize the 5-yr POW for 2007-2011 and submit to IDA
MOH to maintain a credible financial management system and submit quarterly unaudited financial report for the project coveringthequarter no later than 3 months after the end of each quarter
MOH to submit Annual Audit Reports no later than 9 months of end of financial year audited
MOH to submit annual project status report as part of Annual Health Sector Review by March 31 of each year
